title: Remove solrjs from svn -- point docs to AJAX Solr
description:
The solrjs version in solr source tree needs some attention, yet progress seems unlikely.  Meanwhile, AJAX solr (a solrjs fork) has made good progress and seems that it will be supported moving forward.  

We should archive solrjs and remove it from the source tree.

For discussion, see:
http://www.lucidimagination.com/search/document/900bf257f8df4e37/archive_solrjs_and_point_to_ajax_solr#13f6cb2ec40ae1f0

comments.author: Yonik Seeley
comments.content: As far as commits to svn, +1 for just removing.
